name: Golden Tee Golf 2012
overview:
Golden Tee Golf 2012 is the "offline" edition of Golden Tee LIVE. With the same stunning courses and cutting edge graphics as GT LIVE, Golden Tee Golf 2012 offers players a more laidback video golf experience without taking away the competitive factor that has made Golden Tee the barroom staple it is today. With calmer winds, gentler slopes and easier greens for easier putting, Golden Tee Golf 2012 offers a way to introduce players to the GT brand.

Features include:
* 35 Total Golf Courses Available For Play
* Adjustable / Different Player Difficulty Levels
* Premium Golf Clubs and Balls Available
* Hundreds Of Different Clothing Options
* Local Scoring and Local Leaderboards Included
* Golden Tees Available For Use / "Bite" Included
* Helpful video golf instructional tips from Steven Sobe,
the three-time Golden Tee Golf Global Champion !
* Live Commentary from Peter Jacobsen, Gary Player,
Chris DiMarco, Laura Diaz and announcer Jim Nantz!
